column4: I was having trouble restarting bind9. I kept seeing references to the error being associated with rndc.key, and I noticed the date on rndc.key was 2010-05-21, a year ago yesterday.
so you made a 1 year valid key
that's what it looks like. I haven't seen anything in the documentation about an expiration, though.
most keys have a default of 1 year when you make them
